Most team-building activities elicit embarrassment rather than enthusiasm. Whatever impact they might have is nullified by the sheer reluctance of your team members to participate in them. However, there are some team-building activities that your people will actually enjoy. Some of these will take just a few minutes, some might take hours. A few will impact your communication, while others will improve collaboration skills.
